svg:

Input: nums = [1,3,-1,-3,5,3,6,7], k = 3Output: [3,3,5,5,6,7]Explanation: Window position Max--------------- -----[1 3 -1] -3 5 3 6 7 3 1 [3 -1 -3] 5 3 6 7 3 1 3 [-1 -3 5] 3 6 7 5 1 3 -1 [-3 5 3] 6 7 5 1 3 -1 -3 [5 3 6] 7 6 1 3 -1 -3 5 [3 6 7] 7Monotonic Deque[0,3,-1][3,-1,-3][0,0,5][0,5,3][0,0,6][0,0,7]pop all < -1pop all < -3pop all < 5pop all < 3pop all < 6pop all < 7Logicfor i in range(len(nums)): if deque[0] < i - k + 1: deque.pop_front() while deque[-1] < nums[i]: deque.pop_back() deque.push_back(nums[i]) if i >= k - 1: ans.push_back(deque.[0]) Storing indexes instead of valuesmakes logic easier
